speaker: Me
dialog: Hey! Please slow down for a second!

speaker: Friend
dialog: Oh hey! See, I told you we’d make it back in t- Huh? Is there something wrong?

speaker: Me
dialog: What do you mean, “is there something wrong”? That forest was terrifying, how could you leave me all alone like that?!?

speaker: Friend
dialog: What are you talking about? It was just a sunny little forest path, I made sure I wasn’t too far ahead the entire time

speaker: Me
dialog: Let me get this straight...you didn’t see the forest get darker all of a sudden?

speaker: Me
dialog: You didn’t see the portals...? All the strange stuff scattered about?

speaker: Friend
dialog: Uhm...do you want to sit down for a sec? Maybe you should stay back from your studies today.

speaker: Me
dialog: Oh! Right, I suppose that is the reason why we went through that place to begin with. Might as well make this worth it.

speaker: Friend
dialog: If you say so...ah, thank you, by the way.

speaker: Me
dialog: Y..yeah! I’m fine, really, don’t worry about it.

speaker: Friend
dialog: Well, if you say so! I’ll meet up with you after you’re done here! See ya later.!

speaker: Me
dialog: I wonder what that all was...in any case, I won’t be taking any strange shortcuts again after this, I’ll tell you that.
